name: São Paulo
WelcomeMessage:
São Paulo, a sprawling megacity of contrasts and opportunities, is at the heart of Brazil's economic and cultural life. From its towering skyscrapers to its vibrant local markets, the city thrives with energy and ambition.

However, São Paulo also faces unique challenges. Its rapid urban growth, heavy traffic, and environmental issues demand innovative solutions and a collective effort for sustainable development.

Your journey begins here, in a city that never sleeps, yet dreams of a brighter, greener future. Will you rise to the occasion, balancing growth with responsibility, and help São Paulo become a beacon of progress for generations to come?

rewardItems.name: Golden Metro Card
rewardItems.description: A premium card symbolizing efficient and sustainable transit solutions in São Paulo.
rewardItems.endgamefeedback: You have successfully addressed São Paulo's urban challenges, showcasing your leadership and vision for a sustainable future. Your efforts have earned you admiration and respect across the city.

rewardItems.name: Silver Transit Badge
rewardItems.description: A sleek badge commemorating your achievements in public transportation.
rewardItems.endgamefeedback: You have made significant strides in improving São Paulo's transportation network, earning praise for your dedication to progress. Well done on leaving a positive mark on the city!

rewardItems.name: Bronze Urban Planner Medal
rewardItems.description: A medal celebrating your initial steps towards urban improvement.
rewardItems.endgamefeedback: You have taken meaningful actions to address São Paulo's challenges, demonstrating your commitment to positive change. Your efforts are appreciated, and your leadership is noted.

urbanChallenges.name: Vehicle Emissions and Air Quality
urbanChallenges.description: São Paulo's reliance on motor vehicles leads to significant air pollution, affecting public health and visibility.

options.description: Invest in public transportation to reduce car usage
Set stricter vehicle emission standards and promote electric vehicles

urbanChallenges.name: Inefficient Urban Infrastructure
urbanChallenges.description: Inefficient urban planning in São Paulo results in poor traffic flow and excessive commuting times.

options.description: Redesign major intersections to improve traffic flow
Develop mixed-use zones to reduce the need for long commutes

urbanChallenges.name: Daily Traffic Gridlock
urbanChallenges.description: São Paulo faces daily gridlock due to over-reliance on personal vehicles and underdeveloped public transit options.

options.description: Introduce congestion pricing in high-traffic areas
Expand the metro and bus rapid transit systems

urbanChallenges.name: Housing and Commute Distances
urbanChallenges.description: High housing costs force many São Paulo residents to live far from work, increasing traffic congestion.

options.description: Allow market forces to dictate housing development
Incentivize developers to build housing near transit lines
Subsidize affordable housing closer to business hubs

urbanChallenges.name: Waste Collection Traffic Disruption
urbanChallenges.description: Traffic congestion worsens due to inefficient waste collection schedules clogging narrow streets during peak hours.

options.description: Introduce smart waste collection routes to minimize delays
Shift waste collection to nighttime hours
Continue with current waste collection practices
